mapper.insert: insert into user (user_name, user_email, user_password, user_createtime, user_updatetime) values (#{name}, #{email}, #{password}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, user_email, user_password, user_createtime, user_updatetime from user where user_id = #{id}
select user_id, user_name, user_email, user_password, user_createtime, user_updatetime from user where user_name = #{name}
